content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The company has an extensive library of CDs and DVDs – \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://media.epam.com/index.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Media Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". There you can find a wealth of materials on various subjects – from books for English study to specialized technical literature and EPAM project literature, video from conferences and corporate events, audiobooks and much more. These materials will be useful for you on future projects and are an excellent foundation for self-development.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To choose materials that interest you, use the catalog in the left-hand menu, then click <Insert Disk Into CD-ROM>.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the download link becomes active, you will get an e-mail notification from the Library Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition to the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://epmsp002/Media/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Media Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", there is the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://library.epam.com/index.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Electronic Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", where you can find print and electronic editions of books. Choose the literature that interests you and click <Get a paper copy>, <Download> or <Order it>. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the book becomes available for reading or downloading, you will receive a notification from the Library Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Want to share an interesting book or other materials with your colleagues? - Recommend! To do it, click <Add recommendation> on the main page of the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://epmsp002/Media/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Media Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://library.epam.com/index.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Electronic Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you have any questions, address them to your Lab-lead.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
